definition: medium/intermediary/matchmaker/go-between/abbr. for 媒體|媒体[mei2 ti3], media, esp. news media

pinyin: mei2 ti3 jie1 kou3 lian2 jie1 qi4
mei2 ti3 fang3 wen4 kong4 zhi4
Wei2 ji1 mei2 ti3 Ji1 jin1 hui4

definition: self-media (news or other content published on independently-operated social media accounts)

sentences.english: The press began to lionize him enthusiastically.
sentences.chinese: 媒體開始狂熱地吹捧他。

sentences.english: They rely on police and media pressure to reform such businesses, he added.
sentences.chinese: 他們依靠警方和媒體壓力來改革此類營生，他說。

sentences.english: Censorship of printed and audiovisual media.
sentences.chinese: 緬甸的印刷媒體和視聽媒體均受政府監控。

sentences.english: Censorship of printed and audiovisual media.
sentences.chinese: 緬甸的印刷媒體和視聽媒體均受政府監控。

sentences.english: The tools of media will become more easy to use and more affordable.
sentences.chinese: 媒體工具會變得更加容易操作，更加便宜。

sentences.english: Bokova that media facilities should not be the target of military operations.
sentences.chinese: 博科娃指出，媒體設施不應當成爲軍事行動的目標。

sentences.english: Hey, that's the economic reality in sports and sports departments today.
sentences.chinese: 嗨，今天體育界和媒體體育部的經濟現狀就是如此。

sentences.english: That should be the attitude that we in the media should strive for.
sentences.chinese: 這是我們這些媒體人應有的正確態度。

sentences.english: Local media and netizens have hence nicknamed Liu a "nisemusume" or "pseudo girl.
sentences.chinese: 在那之後，他被當地媒體和網民冠以“僞娘”稱號。

sentences.english: He handled the gaggle of media, sponsors and fans with extraordinary aplomb .
sentences.chinese: 他處理的媒體，贊助商和球迷們以非凡的沉着鵝羣。

sentences.english: Some media reports have argued that a strong China will pursue hegemony, and have made an issue of it.
sentences.chinese: 一些媒體炒作所謂中國“國強必霸”。

sentences.english: The otaku the media picks up on are usually this kind.
sentences.chinese: 該宅拿起媒體上通常這種。

sentences.english: State media reported that Shahram Amiri was asking for a quick return to Tehran.
sentences.chinese: 伊朗國家媒體報導說，阿米里要求迅速返回德黑蘭。

sentences.english: The rest of the Whitewater media was silent on the subject.
sentences.chinese: 其它報道白水事件的媒體在這個問題上則保持沉默。

sentences.english: Methods Multimedia technology was used in cardiothoracic surgical teaching.
sentences.chinese: 方法在胸心外科教學中使用多媒體教學方法。

sentences.english: Virtuality and social media are closely tied.
sentences.chinese: 虛擬世界和社會化媒體關係緊密。

definition: to interview/to gather news/to hunt for and collect/to cover
to have sth to do with/to relate to/related to/to concern/concerning
domestic and international/at home and abroad
